name: Unidentified_Kowakian_monkey-lizard_bounty_hunter
content:
This Kowakian monkey-lizard was a back-stabbing and greedy bounty hunter who, sometime after the male Wookiee Chewbacca temporarily escaped enslavement, turned him over to the Galactic Empire.
The Kowakian monkey-lizard bounty hunter was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide by Pablo Hidalgo. It made its first appearance in the television series LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars.
